text: Yesli by Allakh pozhelal, On sdelal by vsekh lyudey v zemnoy zhizni odnoy religii. No Allakh okazyvayet Svoyu milost' tomu, komu pozhelayet, poskol'ku On znayet, chto oni predpochtut pryamoy put' zabluzhdeniyu. A u tekh, kotoryye vredili sebe, buduchi nevernymi, net, krome Allakha, ni pokrovitelya, kotoryy by zashchitil ikh, ni pomoshchnika, kotoryy spas by ikh ot nakazaniya Allakha
